com.paypal.selion.platform.dataprovider

Interface XmlDataProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SeLionDataProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    XmlDataProviderImpl

    public interface XmlDataProvider
extends SeLionDataProvider
    This interface defines prototype to implement xml data provider implementation to parse the xml format data file.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object[][] getAllKeyValueData()
      Generates a two dimensional array for TestNG DataProvider from the XML data representing a map of name value collection.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.paypal.selion.platform.dataprovider.SeLionDataProvider

        getAllData, getDataAsHashtable, getDataByFilter, getDataByIndex, getDataByIndex, getDataByKeys

    • Method Detail

      • getAllKeyValueData

        Object[][] getAllKeyValueData()
        Generates a two dimensional array for TestNG DataProvider from the XML data representing a map of name value collection. This method needs the referenced XmlFileSystemResource to be instantiated using its constructors with parameter Class<?> cls and set to KeyValueMap.class. The implementation in this method is tightly coupled with KeyValueMap and KeyValuePair. The hierarchy and name of the nodes are strictly as instructed. A name value pair should be represented as nodes 'key' and 'value' as child nodes contained in a parent node named 'item'. A sample data with proper tag names is shown here as an example :- 
         
     
         k1
         val1
     
     
         k2
         val2
     
     
         k3
         val3
        Returns:
        A two dimensional object array.
